ExampleDefinition.Title: Use High Quality Rendering
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to apply the new High Quality Rendering mode to a SciChartSurface for smooth anti-aliased lines and fills!
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Use High Quality Rendering</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates how to apply the new High Quality Rendering mode to a SciChartSurface for smooth anti-aliased lines and fills!</Run>
